name: A dicey experiment
description:
Just some random platformer thing I did for GMTK Game Jam 2022 (though not really in time for the jam... 😅)
Theme: roll of the dice

Controls
WASD - move
Space - jump
-/= - change mouse sensitivity, because it's being annoying in WebGL
1-6 - go to a desired side of the die (if you get stuck or bored or something... going to previous ones not fully supported 😅 )

Known issues (that I'm too lazy to fix)
- When you go full screen, you need to click the left mouse button so that Unity takes focus and control of the mouse, otherwise you can't fully rotate when the mouse cursor reaches the end of screen (even though you don't really see a mouse cursor)
- Lights inside are not really lighty and colorful for some reason that I don't have time to investigate
